list.abs: ....8万人居住，是美国的一个名不见经传的普通小城，著名乡村音乐家约翰尼·卡什曾于1969年创作了一首《来自马斯科吉的工人(okie from muskogee)》，被人们广为传唱。哈蒙斯和同龄人有着相同的兴趣：游戏、电影、赛车和摇滚。市民们并不介意这些，反而希.

means.word_mean: 1. a member of the Muskhogean people formerly living in Georgia and eastern Alabama and constituting the core of the Creek Confederacy
2. a town in eastern Oklahoma on the Arkansas River
3. the Muskhogean language spoken by the Muskogee people

auth_sentence.content: 'Get your chopsticks here', you may be out of luck unless you can interpret Mandarin Kanji, even in Muskogee.

auth_sentence.content: In 1917, the first Girl Scout sold a cookie — a troop of scouts in Muskogee, Okla.
